commit message: Updated to Display Images for Those that have them, and otherwise display the exercise description on ExerciseTypeDetail

Updated to Display Images for Those that have them, and otherwise displa...

Adds again padding for images in exercise detail view

Since commit 28ca83b the imageview is added via java code (before: xml).
Not all old Layout Params were set in java code, this commit adds the
padding again.

Besides this the layout file 'dialog_training_history_layout' is moved
to the proper folder.
